channel.title: Hmm
channel.description:
I'm working on Learning more or in depth on Java.. Trying to add compiler to my file and it keeps saying.
[code]'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
my code
[code]@echo off javac *java pause[/code]
I'm following this java tutorial process and it said use that compiler code.
Jdk Version is Jdk1.7.0_01

item.title: Hmm
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

You need the path to javac.exe from your JDK added to your path variable, so it can be accessed from the command prompt. The path would be [i]%programfiles%\Java\jdk*\bin[/i], filling in what’s necessary.

Read full topic

item.title: Hmm
item.dc:creator: @DeathJockey DeathJockey
item.description:
@DeathJockey wrote:

Are you sure you had JDK installed?

Read full topic

item.title: Hmm
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Add the new Java version to your environmental variables

Read full topic
